testCases.label: Verify a new list is instantiated correctly
testCases.description: Checks that createList() returns a non-null List instance.

testCases.label: Verify a new list starts with size 0
testCases.description: Checks that getSize() returns 0 when called on a newly created, empty list.

testCases.label: Verify adding one item updates list size to 1
testCases.description: Adds a single element with addToList() and verifies getSize() returns 1.

testCases.label: Verify list contains an item after it is added
testCases.description: Adds one element with addToList() and verifies the underlying List contains that value.

testCases.label: Verify list contains multiple items after they are added
testCases.description: Adds two elements with addToList() and verifies the List contains both values.

testCases.label: Verify first added item is retrievable at index 0
testCases.description: Adds one element and verifies le.get(list, 0) returns the inserted value.

testCases.label: Verify second added item is retrievable at index 1
testCases.description: Adds two elements and verifies le.get(list, 1) returns the second inserted value.

testCases.label: Verify removing the only item leaves the list empty
testCases.description: Adds one element, removes it with removeFromList(), then verifies the list no longer contains the value and size is 0.

testCases.label: Verify removing one of two items leaves the other intact
testCases.description: Adds two elements, removes one by index, then verifies only the remaining value is present and size is 1.

testCases.label: Verify updating index 0 replaces the old value
testCases.description: Adds two elements, updates the value at index 0 with updateAtPosition(), and verifies the list contains the new value and not the original value.

testCases.label: Verify updating index 1 replaces the old value
testCases.description: Adds two elements, updates the value at index 1 with updateAtPosition(), and verifies the list contains the new value and not the original value.
